title: Sacred Texts 7
description:
Sacred-texts DVD-ROM 7.0

For a list of the included texts http://www.sacred-texts.com/cdshop/dvd70/index.htm


The 7.0 DVD-ROM is the best version of sacred-texts on disk yet. Almost every section has new content, with about two hundred NEW books. The disk now has over 1,400 complete books on it.

The new Swedenborg section has a comprehensive set of his writings. There have been many additions to the Christianity section, including Calvin's Complete Bible commentaries, writings of St. Francis, Aquinas' Summa Theologica and many others. There are nine new Sacred Books of the East volumes: the Hindu Satapatha Brahmana, and the Zoroastrian and Pahlavi texts are complete. The Griffith translations of the White Yajur and Atharava Vedas and the Hatha Yoga Pradipika are new additions in Hinduism. The unabridged text of Gibbon's Decline and Fall of the Roman Empire. The first complete translation of the Epic of Gilgamesh. William Morris' The Earthly Paradise.

As a special bonus, the complete Sanskrit of the Vimanika Shastra is included on the disk in an archive of TIF image files, as well as an MP3 file of The Flying Saucers are Real.

     ***************************************************************

     *     double click the html file "Sacred Texts 7/index.htm"   *
